settings.iplanet_heading1: Help Companies to Grow with Apple Products!
settings.iplanet_heading2: Transform your business by empowering your employees with powerful Apple solutions.
settings.iplanet_textarea1: Growth in business is a continuous process. iPlanet Enterprise helps you to stay connected with top-notch apple solutions. Our Apple experts will take you through hassle-free support services.
settings.iplanet_textarea2: Consultancy  |   Devices |   Apps  |  Deployment |  Training |  Service Support

settings.paragraph_iplanet6:
Consolidated Techware is the Enterprise vertical of the the organisation and is a 100% subsidiary of Consolidated Private Limited

Our strength is in our focus on Apple’s technology. We have built credibility over the last 10 years, through Retail (25 iPlanet Apple Premium Reseller stores); Service (23 Apple Authorised Service centres – Planet Care); and offerings to Enterprise, Government and Education markets.

Productivity, Collaboration and Security are key choices for a company’s IT policy framework. Apple’s strength of platform and ease of integration, makes this a preferred computing choice for employees from global companies to startups.

We align Apple’s zero touch deployment’s, market leading MDM’s, training and leasing solutions, to best align with your digital transformation journey

settings.heading_section6: Apple Products for Business Success: Profit-Driven System
settings.text_section6: Apple products for Business efficiency and success! Let’s discuss their importance, and benefits, and guide corporate leaders & decision-makers.

settings.heading_section6: Apple Products in IT Infrastructure: Seamless Integration
settings.text_section6: Apple products in existing IT infrastructures offer many benefits, from improved productivity to streamlined workflows.

settings.text_section7: iPlanet Enterprise has been a rock solid IT Partner in Digit88’s growth over the past year helping us with critical IT needs with their super responsive and flexible approach to conducting business.
Appreciate iPlanet Enterprise support during this challenging time. Service team support is excellent. I’m always impressed with the dedication and skill of the team.
iPlanet Enterprise was the perfect partner for us, easily exceeded our expectations. They are personable, responsive and results oriented.
